Node.js

Server app for the Node.js Integration Drupal module

Integration

  1. Install Node.js Integration Drupal module on your site
  2. Visit the Node.js configuration page under the Configuration menu, and enter the connection information for your Node.js server application. Set host to node and service key to node-service-key (can be changed in the compose file).

Configuration

Configuration is possible via environment variables. See the full list of variables on GitHub.
